name: 6YS
overview:
6YS was founded in 2003 to provide businesses with a better way to manage their I.T. infrastructure. This is embodied by our key platforms, APPSPOINT and IRONPOINT. We are a service orientated, engineering focused, professional organization that aims to deliver solid professional “on demand” services to clients that seek quality customer service and well engineered, tightly managed I.T. and Web Technologies. 6YS focuses on seamlessly and cost effectively managing our clients’ individual requirements within a high availability, fully redundant environment.

IRONPOINT is a “best of breed” Infrastructure as a Service (or “IaaS”) offering that provides an elastic, scalable virtual environment where our Clients and Channel Partners can quickly and easily provision individual server and network resources or entire Virtual Data Centre environments at the click of a button. Leveraging our powerful web-based provisioning system, new servers and networks can be deployed from templates in minutes.

APPSPOINT is an application delivery platform that enables the consumption of business applications on a “per user, per month” model. It is a true “IT as a Service” offering that leaves a client managing only a contract and a service level agreement. The APPSPOINT platform can be used to access any Windows business application and also encompasses Hosted Exchange, Hosted SharePoint, Hosted Dynamics CRM and Hosted Office Communications Server. All services are provisioned via our intuitive APPSPOINT Control Panel.
